This is awesome. https://t.co/4H7tiDL08U
@dalemcdermott Secondly, a few condescending tweets tone policing a meaningful action is not going to put this one over the line.
@dalemcdermott Woah. First of all, the campaign is not owned by anyone, anyone can do whatever the fuck they like.
@dalemcdermott @JimboBohan Just because something could be true, doesn't mean you're not being condescending. We'll agree to disagree 😄👍🏼
@JimboBohan Absolutely agree, it's a choice for the campaign. All I'm saying is it's a pity some feel the need to lecture and condescend.
@JimboBohan I disagree. I don't think anyone should be told to accept having to apologise or bow and scrape to win.
I just think it's disrespectful to all the thousands of women who deserve our solidarity, not condescension or lecturing.
@JimboBohan Exactly, and I hated it. I hated being told what to do and what was acceptable. I think we owe solidarity, not condescension.
@JimboBohan That's my point. We chose to do that. I would have hated straight people telling me how to conduct myself during the campaign.
